description:
At Brent Adams & Associates in Dunn, North Carolina, we devote our practice to helping our plaintiff clients recover the full amount of compensation they deserve for the injuries and losses they incurred as the result of an accident or mishap caused by another party's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Widely regarded as one of the region's leading legal practices for personal injury, Social Security Disability, workers' compensation and other similar matters, our law firm has served the needs of the injured and disabled since 1973, and during that time, we have recovered millions of dollars for those we have served. In addition, we also maintain a successful bankruptcy practice, so we can help you deal with your overwhelming debt so that you can begin rebuilding a more stable financial future.

Backed by our decades of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys can help significantly increase the odds of achieving the positive results you seek no matter how complex or challenging your situation, and we promise to always treat you with dignity and respect as we aggressively pursue the most favorable outcome on your behalf.

Recognized for our success as well as our impeccable and personalized customer service, our attorneys have received many awards and honors throughout our careers, including recognition from various peer review sources as being among the top litigators in the country.

To receive a free evaluation of your claim from a local attorney you can trust with your most sensitive legal issues, we invite you to contact Brent Adams & Associates by phone or through the online form located on our law firm's website to schedule an appointment.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
